Module it.polimi.ingsw.am07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am07.model.game

Record Class Deck

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
it.polimi.ingsw.am07.model.game.Deck
Record Components:
availableResCards - the uncovered resource cards
availableGoldCards - the uncovered gold cards
visibleResCards - the visible resource cards
visibleGoldCards - the visible gold cards
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public record Deck(List<GameCard> availableResCards, List<GameCard> availableGoldCards, GameCard[] visibleResCards, GameCard[] visibleGoldCards) extends Record implements Serializable
Represents the game deck.

  • Method Details

    • peekTopResCard

      public GameCard peekTopResCard()
      This method is used to peek at the top resource card in the deck. It first checks if the list of available resource cards is empty. If it is, it returns null, indicating that there are no more resource cards in the deck. If it is not, it returns the first card in the list, which is the top card of the deck.
      Returns:
      the top resource card in the deck, or null if the deck is empty

    • peekTopGoldCard

      public GameCard peekTopGoldCard()
      This method is used to peek at the top gold card in the deck. It first checks if the list of available gold cards is empty. If it is, it returns null, indicating that there are no more gold cards in the deck. If it is not, it returns the first card in the list, which is the top card of the deck.
      Returns:
      the top gold card in the deck, or null if the deck is empty

    • pickRandomResCard

      public GameCard pickRandomResCard()
      Picks a random resource card from the deck.
      Returns:
      the picked card

    • pickRandomGoldCard

      public GameCard pickRandomGoldCard()
      Picks a random gold card from the deck.
      Returns:
      the picked card

    • popCard

      public void popCard(GameCard card) throws CardNotFoundException
      Pops a card from the deck and, if needed, replaces it with a substitute card.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to pop
      Throws:
      CardNotFoundException - if the card is not found in the deck

    • popHiddenCard

      private boolean popHiddenCard(GameCard card, List<GameCard> target)
      Pops a card from the deck
      Parameters:
      card - the card to pop
      target - the list from which to pop the card
      Returns:
      true if the card was found and popped, false otherwise

    • popVisibleCard

      private boolean popVisibleCard(GameCard card, Supplier<GameCard> substitute, GameCard[] target)
      Pops a visible card from the deck
      Parameters:
      card - the card to pop
      substitute - the card to replace the popped card with
      target - the array from which to pop the card
      Returns:
      true if the card was found and popped, false otherwise
